reviewText: My husband loves the Tucker, we have the movie with Jeff Bridges and is great. This DVD offers a much different take on Preston Tucker and also have first hand testimonies from family and those who worked closely with him. Great purchase and price.
I truly enjoined the Tucker documentary.

I saw the version with Jeff Bridges in school, and frankly, it was better. But it was also "glossed over" on the facts, so this was more
accurate, which I do prefer.

I would recommend this movie because it is the factual history, not a movie.

A pretty decent look at the car and car maker.
Shame it was built in so few numbers. Understandable given the history.

The GREATEST automobile maker and MOST innovative!
Learn about history and Preston Tucker and the Tucker automobile!
Only 54 car in existence?
I gave this as a present to someone who is a Tucker car enthusiast and they really love it. They highly recommend it.
Tucker's son tells the story of the Tucker car from his unique point of view.
If you are a fan of Tucker autos and want to learn some more this is a great biography. Some rare prototype stuff is shown and some great interviews as well, and those cars are so cool.
Interesting, wish he would have been given a fair shake.....
Use it often in my classroom.
I watched the fictional, 'docudrama' with Jeff Bridges several years ago; this added context, and some interesting facts--especially if you love old cars, in particular, the Tucker.
Great reference for my interest in the Tucker car
